'''Meneldor''' was a great [[Eagles|Eagle]] of the northern mountains, one of the followers of [[Gwaihir|Gwaihir the Windlord]]. He was among the squadron of Eagles who flew to the aid of the [[Captains of the West]] in the last desperate battle before the [[Black Gate]] of [[Mordor]]. With his lord Gwaihir, and Gwaihir's brother [[Landroval]], he flew into the [[Mordor|Black Land]] to the rescue of [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]] and [[Samwise Gamgee|Sam]], and carried one of these two (we are not told which) out of the destruction of [[Mount Doom]].<ref>{{RK|VI4}}, pp. 950-951</ref>

==Etymology==
''Meneldor'' is [[Sindarin]], being probably a combination of ''[[menel]]'' ("the heavens") + ''[[-dor]]''.<ref>{{HM|RC}}, p. 625</ref> 

==Portrayal in adaptations==
[[File:The Lord of the Rings Online - Meneldor.jpg|left|thumb|Meneldor in ''The Lord of the Rings Online'']]
'''2003: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]'':'''
:[http://lotrtcgwiki.com/wiki/lotr17022 A card] in [[Decipher]]'s [[The Lord of the Rings Trading Card Game]] confirms one of the eagles that rescued Frodo and Sam was Meneldor.

'''2007: ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'':'''
:Meneldor and his brother [[Landroval]] appear at several points throughout the game. The player first meet them in the Wailing Hills south of [[Lothlorien]] where they help the Eagles deal with an infestastion of spiders. After their participation in the [[Battle of the Morannon]], the player meets the Eagles once again when they reach the [[Carrock]].
